docblock.description: Universal Feed Writer class
Collection of all channel elements
Collection of items as object of \FeedWriter\Item class.
Store some other version wise data
The tag names which have to encoded as CDATA
Collection of XML namespaces
Contains the format of this feed.
Constructor
docblock.long-description: If no version is given, a feed in RSS 2.0 format will be generated.

docblock.description: Adds a channel element indicating the program used to generate the feed.
Add a XML namespace to the internal list of namespaces.
docblock.long-description: After that, custom channel elements can be used properly to generate a valid feed.

docblock.description: Add a channel element to the feed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: TRUE if this element can appear multiple times

docblock.description: Set multiple channel elements from an array.
Get the appropriate MIME type string for the current feed.
Print the actual RSS/ATOM file
docblock.long-description: Sets a Content-Type header and echoes the contents of the feed. Should only be used in situations where direct output is desired; if you need to pass a string around, use generateFeed() instead.

tag.name: param
tag.description: FALSE if the specific feed media type should be sent.

docblock.description: Generate the feed.
Create a new Item.
Add a FeedItem to the main class
Set the 'encoding' feed attribute
Set the 'title' channel element
Set the date when the ATOM feed was lastly updated.
docblock.long-description:
This adds the 'updated' element to the feed. The value of the date parameter can be either an instance of the DateTime class, an integer containing a UNIX timestamp or a string which is parseable by PHP's 'strtotime' function.

Not supported in RSS1 feeds.

docblock.description: Set the 'description' channel element
Set the 'link' channel element
Set custom 'link' channel elements.
docblock.long-description: In ATOM feeds, only one link with alternate relation and the same combination of type and hreflang values.

tag.name: param
tag.description: media type of the target resource

tag.name: param
tag.description: length of the resource in bytes

docblock.description: Set an 'atom:link' channel element with relation=self attribute.
docblock.long-description: Needs the full URL to this feed.

docblock.description: Set the 'image' channel element
Set the 'about' channel element.
Generate an UUID.
docblock.long-description: The UUID is based on an MD5 hash. If no key is given, a unique ID as the input for the MD5 hash is generated.

tag.name: param
tag.description: optional key on which the UUID is generated

docblock.description: Returns all used XML namespace prefixes in this instance.
docblock.long-description: This includes all channel elements and feed items. Unfortunately some namespace prefixes are not included, because they are hardcoded, e.g. rdf.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Array with namespace prefix as value.

docblock.description: Returns the XML header and root element, depending on the feed type.
Closes the open tags at the end of file
Creates a single node in XML format

tag.name: param
tag.description: tag value as string or array of nested tags in 'tagName' => 'tagValue' format

tag.name: param
tag.description: True if the end tag should be omitted. Defaults to false.

docblock.description: Make the channels.
Prints formatted feed items
Make the starting tag of channels

tag.name: param
tag.description: The vale of about tag which is used for RSS 1.0 only.

docblock.description: Closes feed item tag
Sanitizes data which will be later on returned as CDATA in the feed.
docblock.long-description: A "]]>" respectively "<![CDATA" in the data would break the CDATA in the XML, so the brackets are converted to a HTML entity.

docblock.description: Universal Feed Writer
docblock.long-description: Item class - Used as feed element in Feed class

Contains the format of this feed.
Is used as a suffix when multiple elements have the same name.
Constructor
Return an unique number
Add an element to elements array

tag.name: param
tag.description: The tag name of an element

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies if an already existing element is overwritten.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies if multiple elements of the same name are allowed.

docblock.description: Set multiple feed elements from an array.
docblock.long-description: Elements which have attributes cannot be added by this method

docblock.description: Return the collection of elements in this feed item
Return the type of this feed item

tag.name: return
tag.description: The feed type, as defined in Feed.php

docblock.description: Set the 'description' element of feed item
Set the 'content' element of the feed item For ATOM feeds only

tag.name: param
tag.description: Content for the item (i.e., the body of a blog post).

docblock.description: Set the 'title' element of feed item
Set the 'date' element of the feed item.
docblock.long-description: The value of the date parameter can be either an instance of the DateTime class, an integer containing a UNIX timestamp or a string which is parseable by PHP's 'strtotime' function.

docblock.description: Set the 'link' element of feed item
Attach a external media to the feed item.
docblock.long-description:
Not supported in RSS 1.0 feeds.

See RFC 4288 for syntactical correct MIME types.

Note that you should avoid the use of more than one enclosure in one item, since some RSS aggregators don't support it.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The MIME type attribute of the media.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies, if multiple enclosures are allowed

docblock.description: Alias of addEnclosure, for backward compatibility.
docblock.long-description: Using only this method ensure that the 'enclosure' element will be present only once.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The MIME type attribute of the media.

docblock.description: Set the 'author' element of feed item.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Optional email address of the author

tag.name: param
tag.description: Optional URI related to the author

docblock.description: Set the unique identifier of the feed item

tag.name: param
tag.description: The unique identifier of this item

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the 'isPermaLink' attribute in RSS 2 feeds.
